columns.name: allocation_id
columns.description: Contains the ID representing the allocation of the address for use with EC2-VPC.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the VPC EIP.

columns.name: public_ipv4_pool
columns.description: The ID of an address pool.

columns.name: domain
columns.description: Indicates whether Elastic IP address is for use with instances in EC2-Classic(standard) or instances in a VPC (vpc).

columns.name: association_id
columns.description: Contains the ID representing the association of the address with an instance in a VPC.

columns.name: carrier_ip
columns.description: The carrier IP address associated. This option is only available for network interfaces which reside in a subnet in a Wavelength Zone (for example an EC2 instance).

columns.name: customer_owned_ipv4_pool
columns.description: The ID of the customer-owned address pool.

columns.name: instance_id
columns.description: Contains the ID of the instance that the address is associated with.

columns.name: network_border_group
columns.description: The name of the unique set of Availability Zones, Local Zones, or Wavelength Zones from which AWS advertises IP addresses.

columns.name: network_interface_id
columns.description: The ID of the network interface.

columns.name: network_interface_owner_id
columns.description: The ID of the AWS account that owns the network interface.

columns.name: private_ip_address
columns.description: The private IP address associated with the Elastic IP address.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags that are attached to the vpc.
